mapper.update:
update t_electricity_battery
status =#{status},
update_time =#{updateTime},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select teb.id as id,teb.sn as sn, teb.power as power,teb.voltage as voltage,teb.capacity as capacity, teb.status as status,teb.create_time as create_time,teb.update_time as update_time, teb.del_flag as del_flag from t_electricity_battery as teb where teb.del_flag=0
SELECT eb.* FROM t_electricity_battery eb LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui on tui.now_electricity_battery_sn = eb.serial_number WHERE tui.uid = #{uid};
